Recipe: enchanting_protection_basic_v2
Station: enchanting (Tier 1)

Materials:
  - Earth Crystal x8 (Tier 1) [elemental, earth, common]
  - Iron Ore x8 (Tier 1) [basic, metal, standard]
  - Granite x4 (Tier 1) [basic, stone, durable]

Context: Speckled igneous rock with visible crystalline structure. Harder than limestone, more reliable for load-bearing structures.
